explains: n. 完美主义者，追求完美的人；至善论者

sentences.en: He was such a perfectionist that he published only those results that satisfied him completely.
sentences.cn: 他是个完美主义者，只发表那些令他完全满意的成果。

sentences.en: She's a perfectionist to her fingertips.
sentences.cn: 她是个道道地地的完美主义者。

sentences.en: Virginia was a perfectionist. She was just not prepared to settle for anything mediocre.
sentences.cn: 弗吉尼娅是个完美主义者。她就是无法勉强接受任何平庸的东西。
